Data.p: The total export of marine products from India to various markets of the world was 928214 metric tonnes in the year 2012-13. It increased to 983756 metric tonnes in the year 2013-14, recording a growth of 55542 metric tonnes (5.98%) as compared to 2012-13. The total export of marine products to Japan was 76648 metric
Data.title: Market-wise Export of Marine Products in 2012-13 and 2013-14

Data.p: The production of Urea in India was 1791.3 thousand metric tonnes in the month of April, 2015.\xa0The production of Urea in India was 1954.1 thousand metric tonnes in the month of May, 2015. It increased by 162.8 thousand metric tonnes as compared to the month of April, 2015. In percentage terms, the growth was 9.09%
Data.title: Urea Production from April 2015 to August 2015

Data.p: India had 137685.89 thousand metric tonnes of milk production estimate in the year 2013-14 (Provisional). The top 10 states in terms of estimates of milk production in All India were: Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat, Punjab, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Haryana, Bihar and Tamil Nadu during the year 2013-14(P). Uttar Pradesh had 24193.9 thousand metric
Data.title: Milk Production Estimates  2013-14

Data.p: The Top 10 states of India ranked on the criterion of share of agriculture sector in total electricity sales in the financial year 2013-14 (AP) were: Rajasthan, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Punjab, Andhra Pradesh, Maharashtra, Gujarat, Haryana, Uttar Pradesh and Tamil Nadu. Data.title: Agriculture Sector Share in Total Electricity Sales from 2009-10 to 2013-14

Data.p: The various states of India, including the national capital territory of Delhi, have been ranked on the criterion of growth rate of Agriculture Gross State Domestic Product (GSDP) recorded by the respective states in the financial year 2012-13 as on 01.08.2014. The growth rate of agriculture GSDP is a very important economic measure to assess
Data.title: State Ranks as per Growth rate of Agriculture as on 01.08.2014

Data.p: Rice stock in January 2014 was 16.94 million tonnes. It was 21.24 million tonnes in June 2014. Thus, Rice stock in the month of June 2014 was higher by 4.3 million tonnes as compared to the month of January 2014. Data.title: Monthly Stock of Foodgrains from January 2014 to June 2014

Data.p: Average growth in production of Rice from year 2009-10 to 2012-13 was 34.6%. Its yield has increased from 896 kg/hec to 1825 kg/hec from year 2009-10 to 2012-13. Data.title: Average Production of Major Crops in Madhya Pradesh from 2009-2010 to 2012-2013

Data.p: India has witnessed an increasing trend in fish production during 2007-2013.\xa0In 2007-08, fish production was 7126.79 Thousand tonnes across the country, which increased to 9040.34 Thousand tonnes in 2012-13.\xa0Highest fish production (1808.08 Thousand tonnes) was in Andhra Pradesh in 2012-13 and 1447.27 Thousand tonnes in West Bengal in 2007-08 as compared to other states.
